title: Emerald Pavalamala Haram - A Timeless Statement of Elegance
materials: Polki Diamonds. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster.
features: Intricately handcrafted Haaram featuring traditional Kundan setting and Polki diamond embellishments. The necklace boasts a delicate lattice pattern and is centered with a stunning Zambian Emerald. Features peacock motif, embodying grace and prosperity. Dangles feature gold beads, adding a gentle sway and shimmer.
colors: Predominantly Gold with vibrant Green Emeralds and the brilliant sparkle of Polki Diamonds. Hints of pavalam (red coral) are seen in some settings
occasions: or formal gatherings. A magnificent piece for the bride (Vadhuvu) or any special occasion like seemantham (baby shower) or half-saree function (Langa Voni).
description: This Haaram represents a harmonious blend of traditional craftsmanship and timeless design. The use of natural Zambian Emeralds and Polki diamonds creates a regal aesthetic. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting, radiant shine. It's an investment in artistry and cultural heritage.
